lead_paragraph: COLLINS--Peter M.,73, died peacefully on March 5. Son of the late George S. and Margaret (O'Reilly) Collins and brother of the late John G. Collins. He is survived by his loving wife Susan Brenner Collins and his brother Christopher J. Collins and many cherished family members and friends. Peter was graduated from Fordham Prep and the College of the Holy Cross, and he received his MA from the University of Pennsylvania and JD from New York University Law School. He practiced law in New York City for more than 30 years and was a Fellow of the College of Commercial Arbitrators. A visitation will be held at the Frank E. Campbell Funeral Home, 1076 Madison Avenue, NYC, NY on March 10 from 5-8pm. A Funeral Mass will be held at the Church of St. Ignatius Loyola, 980 Park Avenue, NYC, NY at 10am on Friday, March 11 followed by burial at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. Friends may consider donations to the St. Ignatius Loyola Music Program. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COLLINS, PETER M.
